title: Brown Packing Recalls Veal Products Due To Possible E. Coli Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, July 23, 2015 Brown Packing Company, a South Holland, Ill. establishment, is recalling an undetermined amount of beef (veal) trimmings that may be contaminated with E. coli O157:H7 and non-O157 Shiga toxin-producing E. coli (STEC), the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection...
